content.brief:
The CISO Council seeks to improve and enhance the cybersecurity posture of the United States by providing a government-wide forum that:

  • promotes the identification, development, and promotion of best practices;
  • promotes shared situational awareness and threat identification;
  • develops and promulgates information security policy;
  • improves strategic hiring and training of cybersecurity professionals, encourages fielding of shared services; and
  • serves as a professional development forum for cybersecurity professionals.
